ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to clarify when the examination of a person who makes a claim for refugee protection ends. The amendments will eliminate the ambiguity with respect to officersâ€™ authorities to question and require the refugee claimant to produce any evidence that an officer reasonably requires.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0060 Publication Date: 2018-04-18
